des: "This recipe was given to me by a coworker for the holidays. It is best when made with olives purchased at a deli.  Serve with your favorite cracker, baguettes or thin italian bread slices."
ins: Combine the black olives, green olives, kalamata olives, and garlic in the container of a food processor. Pulse to chop, then add balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Process until smooth. Refrigerate for at least one hour, or overnight if possible, before serving.
